nodes.text: Marshal was a title for individuals of heightened status. During the Clone Wars, it was held by Phara on the Outer Rim planet of Vallt. While marshal, she lead her faction against Vallt's government before launching a coup and taking over the government and planet. In the town of Mos Pelgo on the planet Tatooine, the town's lawman, Cobb Vanth, was known as "The Marshal" and held the title. Carasynthia Dune later adopted the title in a settlement on Nevarro, and continued to serve in that capacity as a Marshal of the New Republic.
